intro: Psychotria praecox, commonly known as the early flowering psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Psychotria praecox is also noted for its ornamental value and is cultivated in some horticultural settings.
